message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $150 for this product.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $165. It's still a great price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal!
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $140 for the product.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'll sell the product to you for $155. It's still a great price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal!
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offers. I am now willing to pay $145 for the product.
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I'll sell the product to you for $152.50. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal!
Hello Alice, thank you for your continued flexibility. I am now willing to pay $147.50 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll sell the product to you for $150. This is my final offer. It's the best I can do.
